French: Je ne veux pas en discuter.
Tom est obligé de le faire.

English: Tom is obliged to do that.
I knew i could do it.
What have you done to yourself?
As soon as i {{c::finish}}, i am going out.
French: Dès que je termine, je sors.

English: As soon as i finish, i am going out.
Tom has a lot of toys.

French: Je n'arrive pas à les distinguer.

English: Tom has a lot of responsibilities.

French: Je ne porte jamais de chapeau.
Je suis un bourreau de travail.

English: What {{c::seems}} to be the problem here?
I will be waiting for you at the {{c::cafe}}.
What do you know about this place?
